title: IATA/ASTA travel agent credentials and commission statements
dataVerified: Agency name, IATA/ASTA number, commission amounts, supplier, period
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Credential status (active/valid). Link to IATA/ASTA system (agency only, requires authentication)
rationale: Domain binding verifies IATA/ASTA. Commission verification. Fraud prevention (fake travel agencies). Agent credential verification.
